page.title: 16QUESTIONAIRE - RESULTS 4
page.content: {SECTION 4 : GRANDPARENTS' HOUSING {*********************************} 1.Where did the Grandparents live in the 1950's ? {Rossendale 45% Elsewhere 55% The rest of the results are concerned with Grandparent's who lived in the survey area. 2.In what type of house did they live? {Terraced 78% Semi 11% Detached 5.5% {Bungalow 5.5% 3.Age of the house ? { Pre War 61% Inter War 39% 4.Is the house still standing ? {Yes 100% 5.Has the house been altered to your knowledge ? { Yes 55.5% No 45.5% 6.What kind of alterations ? {Bathroom added 80% Extension 20% 7.Did the Grandparents possess a vehicle in 1950? {Yes 33.3% No 66.6%
